Global Discover Options

The stories below are four seperate embeds created with gobi.discover(). Global options are provided for the bubbles and players which are applied to every embed. The default options are set to:

  • bubbleSize is set to 100px.
  • color is set to blue.
  • autoStartWithSound is set to true.

The bubbles override the global options with:

  • The first story does not override any configuration.
  • The second story overrides bubbleSize.
  • The third story overrides color.
  • The fourth story overrides autoStartWithSound to false.
